channel.title: PHP MVC
channel.description: A Pure PHP Composer based MVC Framework to Cover All Requirements!

item.title: PHP 7.4.0 is now released!
item.description: Today, the PHP development team announced the immediate availability of PHP 7.4.0 and it comes with numerous improvements and new features.
item.dc:creator: PHP MVC
